attributes.action: To consider the fact that global warming may not be caused by Man
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This hypothesis is strengthened by the recent interception of emails from the Climate Research Institute. Further research shows that the climate has ALWAYS been changing in cycles and that the graphs show that CO2 levels follow graphical transients in temperature and not the reverse.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
